DOC.brief_summary: The investigators plan to perform a prospective randomized, head-to-head trial to test the hypothesis that the addition of Braun enteroenterostomy to standard pancreaticoduodenectomy (PD) reconstruction can decrease the rates of Postoperative Pancreatic Fistula (POPF) and/or Delayed Gastric Emptying (DGE).
DOC.brief_title: Pancreaticoduodenectomy With or Without Braun Enteroenterostomy: Comparison of Postoperative Pancreatic Fistula and Delayed Gastric Emptying
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing pancreaticoduodenectomy surgery at Johns Hopkins Hospital Pregnant women Patients under the age of 18 adults lacking ability to consent, patients scheduled for laparoscopic whipple surgery nonenglishspeakers, and prisoners
